alert.note: Alert for Meade; Morton; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 21 at 1:52PM CST until February 22 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 084, 085, 086, 087, AND 088... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 084, 085, 086, AND 087... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton, Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens, Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward and Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade. * WINDS...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly, given the ongoing severe drought. Any outdoor burning is strongly discouraged Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
